products.name: Garmin dēzl™ OTR620, High-Res 6” GPS Truck Navigator, Custom Truck Routing, Satellite Imagery, Wind Speed, Community-Shared Loading Docks, Truck Entrances & Parking Availability, Popular Truck Paths
products.description: 6-inch touchscreen offers a bright, crisp, high-resolution display for easy in-cab viewing     Get custom truck routing based on the size and weight of your truck (not available in all areas; always defer to posted road signs and road conditions); see alerts for upcoming bridge heights, sharp curves and more     Approach loading docks, truck entrances and security gates with ease; expert arrival planning with BirdsEye Direct Satellite Imagery shows high-resolution overhead views of your destination     As part of the dēzl community of fellow truck drivers, you can easily find the best-rated available truck parking spots along your route and rate your experience to share with the community (when paired with the dēzl app on your compatible smartphone); you can also navigate to where the trucks go by searching for nearby community-shared loading docks, security gates and truck entrances associated with your destination     Quickly find nearby CAT Scale locations in the U.S. and Canada to verify your truck is within legal weight limits before hitting the road     Wind speed weather overlay on the map shows potentially hazardous conditions and alerts when there are high winds detected on your route (requires use of the dēzl app on your compatible smartphone)     Built-in PrePass notifications help you save time and improve efficiency with on-screen weigh station and bypass notifications; requires active PrePass account and use of the dēzl app on your smartphone enabled with BLUETOOTH technology

products.name: Leadfan Car Stereo Radio for Dodge RAM 1500 2500 3500 2013-2018 Wireless CarPlay Android Auto, 9" IPS Touch Screen Car Audio Receiver with WiFi GPS Navigation/Bluetooth/Backup Camera/SWC
products.description: 🚓【Applicable Car Models】Leadfan car stereo radio for Dodge Ram 1500 2500 3500 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 with Manual AC features a 9-inch 1024*600 IPS touchscreen, Android 12 operating system, 4-core processor and 2GB RAM + 32GB ROM to ensure smooth operation and faster response. Connect to Wi-Fi to surf the web and browse a variety of free APPs.（CanBUS Included)     🚓【Wireless CarPlay, Android Auto & Mirror Link】 Simply connect your iPhone or Android phone to the Dodge Ram 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 radio screen via WiFi and Bluetooth. Utilize Siri or Google voice assistant, or interact with the touchscreen display to access online maps, make calls, send and receive messages, enjoy music, and more. (👉NOTE: Some Samsung phones don't support it.)     🚓【Online & Offline Maps】Dodge Ram 1500 2500 3500 CarPlay comes preloaded with maps of North America. Once the GPS antenna is connected, it can be utilized for route planning. Alternatively, CarPlay/Android Auto can be used for online navigation. For real-time traffic flow information, an online map app can also be downloaded from the store.     🚓【Steering Wheel Control & Back-up Camera】And you can use the steering wheel controls to control Dodge Ram radio options, change music and volume for safer driving. Reversing camera with IP68 waterproof and IR night vision features, when backing up, the rear view camera automatically switches to show the perfect image.     🚓【Bluetooth 5.1 & FM Radio, EQ Adjustable】Dodge Ram Android Auto with built-in Bluetooth 5.1, IOS and Android smartphone Bluetooth hands-free calling and music playback. It has FM radio and stereo EQ: Jazz, Rock, Pop, Classic, etc. You can not only play multimedia outside the network, but also play music or video online through the network.     👁️‍🗨️【NOTE】Prior to the installation of the Dodge Ram 1500 2500 3500 car radio, it is essential to disconnect the car battery. Following the installation of the car radio, ensure that the car battery is connected. Failure to adhere to these steps may result in a blown car fuse or malfunction in the dashboard.     💖【Best Customer Service】We provide 24 hours after-sales technical support to help you solve installation and operation problems. 30 days money back service, 12 months after-sales support, if you have any questions about our car audio, please feel free to contact us.
